text: Marujita Díaz (María del Dulce Nombre Díaz Ruiz; 27 April 1932 - 23 June 2015) was a Spanish singer and actress. She was born in Sevilla, Spain. Díaz was known for presenting the very popular show Música y estrellas. Díaz died of respiratory failure caused by colon cancer in Madrid, aged 83.Fallece Marujita Díaz, musa de la España cañí ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Entertainers from Andalusia Category:People from Seville Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish singers
title: Marujita Díaz
